attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Luke McCormick was sentenced to 7 years 4 months in prison this week after pleading guilty to causing Arron & Ben's deaths by dangerous driving. He also pleaded guilty to driving with excess alcohol.
The laws for drink driving (and especially causing death)NEED to be changed. Alcohol affects different people in different ways so there should be ZERO tolerance to Drink Driving. PLEASE SUPPORT US.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
